law.catch_line: Effect of federal grants upon public purchasing units.
law.text: If federal grant or other federal requirements differ from the provisions of this code or regulations adopted hereunder, nothing in this code or its regulations shall inhibit any public purchasing unit from complying with the terms and conditions of the federal grant or other federal requirements.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 64, effective January 1, 1980
